channel.title: Javafx
channel.description: i was wonder if making the webclient in javaFX might speed the client up or give the it more possibilities. hope someone has experience with it so they can give me a good answer in while i wait il do some research for myself.

item.title: Javafx
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:250051”]I think he means like code a RS client in another language, for example OpenGL, i may be wrong.
And he hopes that it will be better graphics, less lag, and just generally faster.[/quote] exactly thx SilentCJ for better explaining. it seems that people find what i write hard to understand b/c im not perfectly clear on everything. in my research so far i have seen a couple of games: pac-man, pong, some other older one. but they are to fast(the timeings were off or something). pong for example you cant when at least i couldn’t. it is a “script” im guessing its scripting language “JavaFX Script” and it is suppose to be competing with adobe flash i heard. it may take some more releases or it may be able to be joined with another language example “java and c/c++ join through python.” idk im just tring to come up with more ideas. thx again SilentCJ. and miss silabsoft i was wanting to learn better programming techniques and learning simpler code.

Read full topic
